file_content.text: Thanks to your help, my reign is safe.
My network of spies reports that you crushed my enemies underfoot and found the symbols of power I requested.
There you go.
Just give me the data so I can leave this place.
Don't waste my time.
We have a deal. I expect you to honor it.
Now fulfill your end.
I had not forgotten.
I, too, have been very busy. Here is the data my servants collected before the temple transformed them.
Let the Empire make of it what they will.
Thank you.
You're welcome. Oh, and--
I hope your face never spoils my view again.
Good riddance.
Enjoy your empire while it lasts.
They won't let you continue.
Actually, that reminds me.
There is one last, itty bitty little thing you can do. You see, power is useless without subjects.
So I'd be grateful if, when you turn in the data, you'd encourage the Imperials to send more expeditions my way.
I see.
You're really every bit as conniving as the real thing, you know that?
You might make it as a Sith.
Yes, I do think I've finally found my true calling.
Maybe.
I can assure you, my gratitude, if you send more slaves to be my followers, will not be insubstantial.
A simple exchange--the symbols of Lord Venerous's power for the data.
Do you dare approach the great Nil Venerous, Lord of the Sith, master of the undying darkness!
Answer me! What insolence brings you to this place, slave?
I will not tell you again, I'm not a slave! I'm Sith!
Do not address me like that.
You talk big, but I smell your fear. You're no Sith.
Don't pretend.
I'm a servant of the Empire. I'm authorized to be here.
Not insolence, duty.
I'm the one holding the blaster, here.
Don't threaten me.
I beg your forgiveness.
Then watch how you approach! Nil Venerous is lord of domains! Master of dominions! You are nothing in his sight!
Now tell me, weakling--who has sent you here and why?
I'm looking for data. Help me find it or get out of my way.
I won't play your game.
The master of data-collection expeditions sent me.
Captain--I mean Lord Fizik.
Data? Data! Perhaps I can help you gather this data. My followers do much research in these catacombs.
But the help of the great Lord Venerous comes at a price!
I will do whatever you ask, my lord.
I live to serve.
Yes, of course.
Listen well. I may part with my followers' research, but you must do something for me in exchange.
Nil Venerous's enemies are many, and they have stolen my symbols of power. I want you to venture deep into enemy territory and bring the symbols back to me!
How will I know these symbols when I see them?
Symbols?
They are ancient objects marked with the sign of Nil Venerous.
Of course.
Whatever you say, Lord Insanitous.
Okay, crazy man.
Insult me again and it will be for the last time!
Now, go! You will have your data when you return with the symbols of my power!
Don't be a fool.
This is insane.
You don't look like a Sith Lord, and you wear a slave collar.
Something's not right here.
What? You're not afraid of me?
You aren't a mindless puppet like the rest of them? I--I don't understand.
Fill me in.
I'm--I'm not sure.
Of course I'm not a puppet!
Puppet?
Then whatever it is that's doing this is losing its hold.
I still have my senses, but someone here is out of his.
No, I'm not the mindless one.
You're right, I was out of my senses. But not anymore.
I--I was part of an expedition sent by the Empire to measure strange activity in the Dark Temple. But soon after we entered, we all became... different people.
I became the mighty Lord Venerous, and the others became my obedient followers and servants!
You seem normal enough now.
I don't see what's wrong.
Yes--for some reason, the madness no longer has its hold on me. Like whatever's causing this dream is losing its power.
Try again.
Wait--you said you were part of an expedition?
Expedition?
We were gathering data for the Empire and then we were all suddenly... possessed.
It's strange that you seem to be unaffected. In fact, it's strange to find you here at all.
I thought the Imperials gave up sending people in here. What exactly are you doing here?
The Imperials want data. I'm going to get it for them.
Data-gathering.
I was sent after your expedition.
It seems you're missed.
I'm doing a vital service to the Empire.
Just my duty.
So the Imperials haven't given up on getting their precious data after all.
This is lucky. See, ever since I came to my senses, I've been worried that my followers would begin to doubt my leadership.
I can't lose my power. I can't go back to being a slave! But maybe--maybe we can help each other?
It wouldn't be hard for me to eliminate you and your followers.
Or I could kill you.
I guess that's true, except--except I'm the only one who can make all the others turn in their data.
I guess.
Go on.
All--all I ask is that you find the symbols of Lord Venerous's power. They were looted from his tomb by the people possessed by Venerous's enemies.
The symbols will help me reinforce my followers' belief in me--lock them in their dream.
I bring the symbols, and you give the data.
Got it.
We'll see.
It seems you've only left me the one option if I want that data.
Do I have a choice?
Please, just think awhile about my offer.
Be careful--Venerous's old enemies will put up a good fight.
I am the great Nil Venerous! Lord of the Sith!
